Articles.Subject: Math
Articles.Title: Adding from 0 to 100
Articles.Abstract: There exists to be an equation that can add numbers from any possible positive range (1 + 2 + 3 + 4 + 5...). How does it work? How do you find it?

Articles.Subject: Math
Articles.Title: Completing the square
Articles.Abstract: Completing the square is often taught in high school in a quick but rather superficial way. This could prevent the student from having a complete understanding of the subject being taught. And so, this article was made for the curious students, for those who want to get the full picture of Completing The Square.
